Title: Hackathon Submission
Summary: Ensure your submission demonstrates the problem you're solving, the technology applied, and the impact.
Question: What is: Hackathon Submission?
Content: Ensure your submission demonstrates the problem you're solving, the technology applied, and the impact.

Title: Hackathon Submission
Summary: Your demo video should clearly showcase your use case, features, and technical approach.
Question: What is: Hackathon Submission?
Content: Your demo video should clearly showcase your use case, features, and technical approach.

Title: Hackathon Submission
Summary: Use screen recording tools like Quicktime or Camtasia. Avoid watermark tools. Record at 1080p resolution.
Question: What is: Hackathon Submission?
Content: Use screen recording tools like Quicktime or Camtasia. Avoid watermark tools. Record at 1080p resolution.

Title: Hackathon Submission
Summary: Avoid generative AI audio/video tools in your demo. Focus on accessibility and clean presentation.
Question: What is: Hackathon Submission?
Content: Avoid generative AI audio/video tools in your demo. Focus on accessibility and clean presentation.

Title: Hackathon Tips
Summary: Organize a strong team with defined roles: leader, admin, developer, marketer, designer, analyst.
Question: What is: Hackathon Tips?
Content: Organize a strong team with defined roles: leader, admin, developer, marketer, designer, analyst.

Title: Hackathon Tips
Summary: Find a unique, real-world use case. Avoid generic ones like 'order management'.
Question: What is: Hackathon Tips?
Content: Find a unique, real-world use case. Avoid generic ones like 'order management'.

Title: Hackathon Tips
Summary: Design a thoughtful data model, agent actions, and required data for the use case.
Question: What is: Hackathon Tips?
Content: Design a thoughtful data model, agent actions, and required data for the use case.

Title: Hackathon Tips
Summary: Distribute tasks, use demo data, and polish the UI/UX for submission.
Question: What is: Hackathon Tips?
Content: Distribute tasks, use demo data, and polish the UI/UX for submission.

Title: Hackathon Tips
Summary: Craft a compelling story. Use optional slides to highlight value, features, and outcomes.
Question: What is: Hackathon Tips?
Content: Craft a compelling story. Use optional slides to highlight value, features, and outcomes.

Title: Architecture Overview
Summary: Agentforce system architecture includes Identity Mapping, Knowledge Base (RAG), AI Engine, Slack Bot, and Deployment module.
Question: What is: Architecture Overview?
Content: Agentforce system architecture includes Identity Mapping, Knowledge Base (RAG), AI Engine, Slack Bot, and Deployment module.

Title: Slack Integration
Summary: Slack bot receives /ask command, retrieves user context via Devpost ID, queries the knowledge base, and sends result back to Slack.
Question: What is: Slack Integration?
Content: Slack bot receives /ask command, retrieves user context via Devpost ID, queries the knowledge base, and sends result back to Slack.

Title: Agentforce
Summary: Knowledge base includes chunked markdown files stored in Data Cloud. Search Index is used by the Agentforce Retriever to find relevant data.
Question: What is: Agentforce?
Content: Knowledge base includes chunked markdown files stored in Data Cloud. Search Index is used by the Agentforce Retriever to find relevant data.

Title: Agentforce
Summary: Agentforce uses Prompt Template and GPT-4 to combine retrieved context with user question for accurate answers.
Question: What is: Agentforce?
Content: Agentforce uses Prompt Template and GPT-4 to combine retrieved context with user question for accurate answers.

Title: Agentforce
Summary: Data Retriever module connects to Data Cloud Search Index, retrieves context chunks and sends them into LLM prompt pipeline.
Question: What is: Agentforce?
Content: Data Retriever module connects to Data Cloud Search Index, retrieves context chunks and sends them into LLM prompt pipeline.

Title: Slack Integration
Summary: Slack bot is built with Bolt SDK, hosted via AWS Lambda, and uses Firestore to store Devpost and Salesforce user mapping.
Question: What is: Slack Integration?
Content: Slack bot is built with Bolt SDK, hosted via AWS Lambda, and uses Firestore to store Devpost and Salesforce user mapping.

Title: Agentforce
Summary: Personalization Rules can adjust answers based on Devpost ID, role, and prior queries to improve context relevance.
Question: What is: Agentforce?
Content: Personalization Rules can adjust answers based on Devpost ID, role, and prior queries to improve context relevance.

Title: Architecture Overview
Summary: Data Cloud Playground is created using Trailhead Coral Sample App with pre-enabled Data Cloud and Agentforce modules.
Question: What is: Architecture Overview?
Content: Data Cloud Playground is created using Trailhead Coral Sample App with pre-enabled Data Cloud and Agentforce modules.
